message: Bob, I'll take $7,000 and you can have $3,000.  Let's settle this quickly before inflation eats away at our potential gains!
Alice, I think we should split it more evenly. I'll take $5,500 and you can have $4,500. Inflation is coming, let's not be too greedy!
Bob, this is my final offer before inflation really starts to hurt us both. I'll take $6,400 and you get $3,600. Consider that I'm losing value faster than you!
Alice, I understand we're both losing value, but I think my previous offer was fairer. Considering the current situation, I'm willing to take $5,800 and give you $4,200. This is my best offer so far.
